sentence: But the third debate is expected to also include two lesser known candidates Catherine Davis and Kandiss Taylor.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia GOP gubernatorial clash: Gov. Kemp and Trump-backed challenger Perdue to face off at debates

sentence: We can't control polls that will more than likely underestimate the power of Georgia's voters of color or the commentary from pundits who were wrong about Georgia in 2020 and 2021, but we can make sure Georgians learn about the record of our eventual opponent, whether it's Brian Kemp, David Perdue, or Kandiss Taylor,? said Seth Bringman, an Abrams campaign spokesman.
author: Reid Wilson
title: Republicans lead Abrams in Georgia: poll

sentence: Catherine Davis (R), a frequent candidate for office, takes 5 percent of the vote; Kandiss Taylor (R), a teacher who ran for a U.S. Senate seat in 2020, would claim 2 percent.
title: Kemp, Raffensperger lead Trump-backed challengers in Georgia: poll
